CustomField.description: True if the Case's Account and it's Parent have verified addresses. False if either one of those is false. Defaults to true is the Parent is blank, because there's nothing to verify.
CustomField.formula:
IF( Parent_Account_Verified__c = true && Contractor_Account_Verified__c = true, 'Both Verified', IF(Parent_Account_Verified__c = false && Contractor_Account_Verified__c = false , 'Both Not Verified', IF(Contractor_Account_Verified__c = false, 'Contractor Account Not Verified', 'Parent Account Not Verified'))
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Either the Claim's Account or it's Parent needs to be validated before a payment can be sent.
CustomField.label: Parent & Contractor Account Verified?
